title: 87/28/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 December 1986 approving an addendum to the Italian programme relating to the treatment, processing and marketing of tobacco pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 10 December 1986
approving an addendum to the Italian programme relating to the treatment, processing and marketing of tobacco pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(87/28/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The addendum to the Italian programme relating to the treatment, processing and marketing of tobacco forwarded by the Italian Government pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 on 7 July 1986 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 December 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 194, 17. 7. 1986, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 305, 14. 11. 1980, p. 67.
